issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Since ti.paint is still working and people use it for signatures it would be nice to have it in the normal modules section again. Currently it is in the archive:
https://github.com/appcelerator-archive/ti.paint/

I've made a PR with an Android update for SDK9 support and updated the repo structure.
fields.summary: Move ti.paint to active modules again
